des: "These are great, but don't even think of trying this unless you KNOW you have a 1000 watt microwave (due to cook time)."
ins: Butter some waxed paper and lay on a flat surface or cookies sheet.  In a 2 1/2 quart microwave dish, stir together sugar, butter, milk, brown sugar, corn syrup, and salt.  Microwave on high, 4 minutes.  Stir.  Microwave another 4 minutes.  Stir in pecans, and drop by tablespoons onto buttered paper.  Let cool.
